metadata.title: Admin users
metadata.description: Manage internal administrators and staff accounts.

internal.label: Internal users
internal.description: Admins and staff created by your team.

selfSignup.label: Self-signup users
selfSignup.description: Users who created their own accounts.

page.title: Internal users
page.description: Create administrators or staff accounts and review their permissions.

errors.unauthenticated: Your session expired. Please sign in again.
errors.forbidden: You are not allowed to view internal users.
errors.loadFailed: Could not load internal users right now. Please try again.

noFilters.title: No internal users yet
noFilters.description: Create the first admin or staff account to manage internal access and permissions.

noMatches.title: No users match your filters
noMatches.description: Try adjusting your search or clearing filters.

tooltip.disabled: {label} is not available for this user.

createDialog.title: Create internal user
createDialog.description: Invite an internal admin or staff member with a temporary password. They can reset it after signing in.
createDialog.bannerDescription: Admins manage users; staff have limited admin access.

admin.label: Admin
admin.title: Admin
admin.description: Full admin access, including user management.
admin.summary: Full admin access, including user management.

staff.label: Staff
staff.title: Staff
staff.description: Staff tools and event management. No user management.

password.label: Temporary password
password.hint: Minimum 8 characters. Ask the user to reset after first sign-in.

errors.unauthenticated: Session expired. Refresh and sign in again.
errors.forbidden: You are not allowed to create internal users.
errors.genericError: Something went wrong while creating the user.

deleteDialog.title: Delete user
deleteDialog.description: This will revoke access and anonymize personal data for {userName}.

warning.title: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
warning.description: Their sessions and credentials will be removed, and their personal data will be anonymized.

errors.unauthenticated: Your session expired. Please sign in again.
errors.forbidden: You are not allowed to delete users.
errors.cannotDeleteSelf: You cannot delete your own account.
errors.notFound: User not found or already removed.
errors.noPassword: Your account does not have a password set. Set a password to confirm deletions.
errors.genericError: Could not delete this user. Try again later.
